compliance.medical_disclaimer: This content is for educational purposes only and not intended to diagnose, treat, cure, or prevent any disease. Please consult with your healthcare provider before starting any supplement regimen.
compliance.authorized_seller_notice: As an Authorized Seller of Thorne, I provide practitioner-only access to professional-grade supplements. Purchases are either fulfilled directly by me as your practitioner, or through Thorne's Patient Express/Web Elite systems. I may receive compensation for these purchases.
compliance.satisfaction_guarantee: All Thorne products come with a 60-day satisfaction guarantee. If you're not completely satisfied with your purchase, you can return it for a full refund, replacement, or store credit.
compliance.return_policy: Products must be returned in original, sealed bottles. Please contact your practitioner for return instructions.
